###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlRebar_SetBandIdealSize

###Description###
Set Ideal width of the band, in pixels.

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiRebar.au3>
_GUICtrlRebar_SetBandIdealSize($hWnd, $iIndex, $iNewSize)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to rebar control
$iIndex
	Zero-based index of the band
$iNewSize
	Ideal width of the band, in pixels
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: True
Failure: False

###Remarks###
None.
